description: This light and citrus-infused grilled chicken and orange quinoa salad recipe is perfect for summer dining al fresco with friends and family.
keywords: Chicken salad,Orange,Soy free,Wheat free,Egg free,Chicken,Dairy free
name: Grilled Chicken & Orange Quinoa Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 medium red onions, peeled, chopped into wedges
4 medium oranges, 2 juiced, 2 peeled and sliced into rounds

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180Â°C. Place the onions in a roasting tin and toss with a tablespoon of oil. Roast for 25 minutes and set aside to cool.

Whisk half of the orange juice with the cinnamon and cumin in a shallow dish and add the sliced chicken. Cover and marinade for 30 minutes. Cook the quinoa according to pack instructions and tip into a large bowl.

Heat a large griddled pan on high heat and sear the orange slices for 2 minutes on each side, until lightly charred. Drain the chicken strips, discard the marinade and cook in the griddle pan for 8-10 minutes until cooked through.

Whisk the remaining orange juice and oil together and pour into the bowl with the quinoa. Mix well and stir in the onions, herbs and orange slices. Serve the quinoa salad topped with chicken and sprinkled with pistachios.
